channel.title: [Release] Rune - Fusion | Rewritten combat | 711 gameframe | 508 maps | 602 Anim
channel.description:
[B][COLOR=Orange]Rune - Fusion [/COLOR]
Rune - Fusion is a simply made server with the mos new things added. I was thinking about adding 667 maps, but since people don't like it i've added 508 maps. To be Honest i've used alot of tutorials as you can see. I think this is a great starter base to begin with if you like 317 mixed with 500+. Enough of talking now some features:
[COLOR=Orange]Features:[/COLOR] Improved combat (tutorial) 602 anims 508 maps 711 gameframe (almost done) PI Skills New hit icons. New shops New training area's Better stability (removed alot of non-used codes) 711 textures Summoning orb. 711 icons, als hand made for fitting into the client. And much more, but please download and see :).
[COLOR=orange]Download:[/COLOR]
Server: [url=http://uppit.com/kletw46mioxk/Rune_-_Fusion_server.zip]Download Rune.Fusion.server.zip @ UppIT[/url] Client: [url=http://uppit.com/ds9jiwf0j6fj/Rune-_Fusion_client.zip]Download Rune.Fusion.client.zip @ UppIT[/url]
Media: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2jczqe8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2cyjm6g.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2rdga5x.png[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/307u6xc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/4q5yrn.png[/img]
I hope you guys will love this, if this is helpfull or you're going to use this than press the "[COLOR=orange]rep[/COLOR]"button :hurr:[/B]
